greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = a(n-1) + a(n-3) + a(n-5).
comment: The ratio of successive terms of this sequence converges to the real root of x^5 - x^4 - x^2 - 1 which is approximately 1.5701473... (see A293506). - _Iain Fox_, Oct 12 2017
link: Robert Israel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..5098
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1, 0, 1, 0, 1).
program: (PARI) first(n) = my(res = vector(n)); res[1] = -3; res[2] = -1; res[3] = 4; res[4] = 8; res[5] = 15; for(i = 6, n, res[i] = res[i-1] + res[i-3] + res[i-5]); res \\ _Iain Fox_, Oct 23 2017
xref: This sequence includes the "Lost" numbers, 4 8 15 16 23 42, A104101. - Rick Powers (powersr(AT)westerntc.edu), Sep 18 2009
results.author: Jian Tang (jian.tang(AT)gmail.com), Oct 19 2006
